name: Hygiene OptiMate
desc: An automated system designed to optimize user experience for hygiene-related tasks. Built using RobotC and Lego EV3 Mindstorm.

name: Automated Guided Vehicle
desc: Part of the Toyota Innovation Challenge. Designed to navigate from pickup to delivery points while avoiding collisions and obeying traffic signals.

name: Polyphonic Piano
desc: An illuminated key circuit that lights up when a key is pressed. Can be customized to play any song. Built using Arduino and C++.

name: The Boson
desc: Designed an upcoming customizable open source XR headset using Fusion 360 for WIRE, an R&D company based in Miami Gardens, Florida, United States.

name: Turtlebot3 Controller
desc: Scripted a keyboard controller with odom feedback for the Turtlebot3 robot that allows users to control the robot using a joystick. Built using C++ and ROS.

name: AI Voice Bot
desc: Aims to deliver voice-to-text conversational AI experiences using Deepgram and Groq models.

name: Motor Tester
desc: Implemented a motor tester on STM32IDE using C logic. Motor testers are useful for determining servo motor range, continuous rotation motor speed, prototype testing, and centering servos.
